creditline: Gift of Margaret V. B. Wurtele
description: standing barefoot male figure wearing long blue robe with white belt; short black hair and black beard; slightly frowning expression; figure holds a skull in his PL hand and a brown cross in his PR hand; halo--black on top, with black radiating lines on underside with blue center circle
markings: on underside, taped: (gallery label and fragment of another paper label)
title: Saint Frances
